arr=[]
for _ in range(int(input())) :
    start,end=[int(x) for x in input().split()]
    arr.append((start,start+end))
arr.sort()
val=[]
for j in range (len(arr)-1) :
    check=arr[j][1]
    ans=1
    if len(val) >0 and len(arr)-j > max(val) :
        break
    for i in range(1,len(arr)) :
        if arr[i][0] > check :
            ans+=1
            check = arr[i][1]
    val.append(ans)
print(max(val))
